transportAdvice: Toulouse has a metro, tram, and bus network that connects the city centre with most tourist areas, making public transit a practical and affordable option. The historic centre is compact and very walkable, and taxis are readily available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally frosty winter days with overcast skies and periodic rain showers.
Still cool but with slightly longer daylight hours and occasional mild sunny spells.
Spring begins with warming temperatures and a mix of sunshine and showers.
Pleasant spring weather with blooming parks, though afternoon showers remain common.
Warm and increasingly sunny with occasional thunderstorms typical of the region.
Warm early summer with long sunny days and only occasional brief storms.
Hot and mostly dry, ideal for outdoor sightseeing and terrace dining.
Consistently hot and sunny, the peak of summer with low rainfall.
